name: APOD Dark Sepia
description: Sepia-toned dark skin for NASA's Astonomy Picture of the Day.
additional_info:
Picture pages are fully reskinned, with support for all screen sizes.

The archive index page has some restyling, but may get a little odd at small screen sizes. Other pages are legible, but don't have any special styling, so they're still straight out of 1995, just less blindingly colored.

Looks best with the Source Serif Pro font (shown in the screenshot) or PT Serif, but will fall back on other serif fonts if those aren't available.
